scripts.setup:all: npm install && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server && npm run setup:ai
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:client -- --coverage && npm run test:server -- --coverage
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npm run migrate:rollback && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/build server/dist
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup:all
